name: 02b-Fr33
description:
After waking up in an unfamiliar world, three robots team up to escape in this puzzle platformer designed for The Indie Game Dev Beginners 003 game jam.

All assets created by XtremeToaster (John Jarvinen) and TuckFinn (Tucker Tyler)

This game will see future development, and we intend to make a full release in the future! Have fun!
